speaker: CLOTEN
text: I am near to th’ place where they should meet,

speaker: CLOTEN
text: if Pisanio have mapped it truly. How fit his garments

speaker: CLOTEN
text: serve me! Why should his mistress, who

speaker: CLOTEN
text: was made by him that made the tailor, not be fit

speaker: CLOTEN
text: too? The rather, saving reverence of the word, for

speaker: CLOTEN
text: ’tis said a woman’s fitness comes by fits. Therein I

speaker: CLOTEN
text: must play the workman. I dare speak it to myself,

speaker: CLOTEN
text: for it is not vainglory for a man and his glass to

speaker: CLOTEN
text: confer in his own chamber. I mean, the lines of my

speaker: CLOTEN
text: body are as well drawn as his, no less young, more

speaker: CLOTEN
text: strong; not beneath him in fortunes, beyond him

speaker: CLOTEN
text: in the advantage of the time, above him in birth,

speaker: CLOTEN
text: alike conversant in general services, and more remarkable

speaker: CLOTEN
text: in single oppositions. Yet this imperceiverant

speaker: CLOTEN
text: thing loves him in my despite. What

speaker: CLOTEN
text: mortality is! Posthumus, thy head, which now is

speaker: CLOTEN
text: growing upon thy shoulders, shall within this hour

speaker: CLOTEN
text: be off, thy mistress enforced, thy garments cut to

speaker: CLOTEN
text: pieces before thy face; and all this done, spurn her

speaker: CLOTEN
text: home to her father, who may haply be a little angry

speaker: CLOTEN
text: or my so rough usage. But my mother, having

speaker: CLOTEN
text: power of his testiness, shall turn all into my commendations.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: My horse is tied up safe. Out, sword,

speaker: CLOTEN
text: and to a sore purpose. Fortune, put them into my

speaker: CLOTEN
text: hand! This is the very description of their meeting

speaker: CLOTEN
text: place, and the fellow dares not deceive me.
